sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react'; import cityTimezones from "city-timezones"; function Weathercard({tempInfo}) { const { temp, humidity, pressure, weatherMood, name, speed, country, sunset } = tempInfo; const cityLookup = cityTimezones.lookupViaCity(name) console.log(cityLookup[0].timezone) // const timeNow = new Date().toLocaleTimeString('en-GB', {timeZone : cityLookup[0].timezone }) let background = ""; // "5:00:00" > timeNow > "16:00:00" ? background = "#191970": background ="#fafafa"; return ( <>
{temp}°
{weatherMood}
{name}, {country}
{new Date().toLocaleString() }

19:19 PM
Sunset

19:19 PM
Humidity

19:19 PM
Pressure

19:19 PM
Wind

) } export default Weathercard
